description: This file defines a ViewModel named SharedAppViewModel for sharing UI-related data across the application. It exposes LiveData properties linked to user preferences and favorites, such as restaurant IDs, menu item IDs, search queries, and filter options. It acts as a shared state holder for various UI components in an Android Kotlin application.

classes.name: SharedAppViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that provides shared UI data related to user favorites and preferences, observable via LiveData.

methods.name: SharedAppViewModel
methods.description: Constructor of the ViewModel, initializing LiveData properties with data from repositories.
